ctx: intros A l l' x H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> length l = length l'" on hypothesis of type "x0 = x".

original: intros A l l' x H. inversion H. apply Permutation_length in H0. simpl in H0. rewrite H0. apply Add_length in H3. apply H3.
